at the current time."},"bytes8LEToUint(bytes8)":{"details":"Do this by converting to bytes, then reversing endianness, then converting to int.","return":"The uint256 represented in LE by the beneficiary."},"determineCompressionPrefix(bytes32)":{"details":"The prefix encodes the parity of the Y coordinate.","params":{"_pubkeyY":"The Y coordinate of the public key."},"return":"The 1-byte prefix for the compressed key."},"evaluateProofDifficulty(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,bytes)":{"details":"Uses the light oracle to source recent difficulty.","params":{"_bitcoinHeaders":"The header chain to evaluate."},"return":"True if acceptable, otherwise revert."},"feeRebateTokenHolder(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"return":"The current token holder if the Token exists. wei."},"fetchBondAmount(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"details":"Calls the keep contract to do so.","return":"The amount of bonded ETH in wei."},"findAndParseFundingOutput(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,bytes,uint8)":{"details":"Gets `_fundingOutputIndex` output from the output vector and validates if it is                             a p2wpkh output with public key hash matching this term"},"signerFeeTbtc(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"details":"Signers are paid based on the TBTC issued.","return":"Accumulated fees in 10**18 decimals."},"signerPKH(DepositUtils.Deposit nodes.documentation:
@notice Calculate TBTC amount required for redemption by a specified
         _redeemer. If _assumeRedeemerHoldTdt is true, return the
         requirement as if the redeemer holds this deposit's TDT.
 @dev Will revert if redemption is not possible by the current owner and
      _assumeRedeemerHoldsTdt was not set. Setting
      _assumeRedeemerHoldsTdt only when appropriate is the responsibility
      of the caller; as such, this function should NEVER be publicly
      exposed.
 @param _redeemer The account that should be treated as redeeming this
        deposit  for the purposes of this calculation.
 @param _assumeRedeemerHoldsTdt If true, the calculation assumes that the
        specified redeemer holds the TDT. If false, the calculation
        checks the deposit owner against the specified _redeemer. Note
        that this parameter should be false for all mutating calls to
        preserve system correctness.
 @return A tuple of the amount the redeemer owes to the deposit to
         initiate redemption, the amount that is owed to the TDT holder
         when redemption is initiated, and the amount that is owed to the
         FRT holder when redemption is initiated.
nodes.name: calculateRedemptionTbtcAmounts

auctionValue(DepositUtils.Deposit storag.details: We calculate the % of the auction that has elapsed, then scale the value up.
auctionValue(DepositUtils.Deposit storag.return: The value in wei to distribute in the auction at the current time.

bytes8LEToUint(bytes8).details: Do this by converting to bytes, then reversing endianness, then converting to int.
bytes8LEToUint(bytes8).return: The uint256 represented in LE by the bytes8.

checkProofFromTxId(DepositUtils.Deposit.details: Stateless SPV Proof verification documented elsewhere (see https://github.com/summa-tx/bitcoin-spv).

params._bitcoinHeaders: An array of tightly-packed bitcoin headers.
params._merkleProof: The merkle proof of inclusion of the tx in the bitcoin block.
params._txId: The bitcoin txid of the tx that is purportedly included in the header chain.
params._txIndexInBlock: The index of the tx in the Bitcoin block (0-indexed).

compressPubkey(bytes32,bytes32).details: Converts the 64-byte key to a 33-byte key, bitcoin-style.

params._pubkeyX: The X coordinate of the public key.
params._pubkeyY: The Y coordinate of the public key.

currentBlockDifficulty(DepositUtils.Depo.details: Calls the light relay and gets the current block difficulty.

depositOwner(DepositUtils.Deposit storag.details: We cast the address to a uint256 to match the 721 standard.

determineCompressionPrefix(bytes32).details: The prefix encodes the parity of the Y coordinate.

params._pubkeyY: The Y coordinate of the public key.

determineCompressionPrefix(bytes32).return: The 1-byte prefix for the compressed key.

evaluateProofDifficulty(DepositUtils.Dep.details: Uses the light oracle to source recent difficulty.

feeRebateTokenHolder(DepositUtils.Deposi.return: The current token holder if the Token exists.                 address(0) if the token does not exist.

fetchBitcoinPrice(DepositUtils.Deposit s.details: Polls the price feed via the system contract.
fetchBitcoinPrice(DepositUtils.Deposit s.return: The current price of 1 sat in wei.

fetchBondAmount(DepositUtils.Deposit sto.details: Calls the keep contract to do so.
fetchBondAmount(DepositUtils.Deposit sto.return: The amount of bonded ETH in wei.

findAndParseFundingOutput(DepositUtils.D.details: Gets `_fundingOutputIndex` output from the output vector and validates if it is                             a p2wpkh output with public key hash matching this deposit's public key hash.

params._txOutputVector: All transaction outputs prepended by the number of outputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC outputs.

previousBlockDifficulty(DepositUtils.Dep.details: Calls the light relay and gets the previous block difficulty.

redemptionTeardown(DepositUtils.Deposit.details: We keep around the redeemer address so we can pay them out.

remainingTerm(DepositUtils.Deposit stora.details: The return value is not guaranteed since block.timestmap can be lightly manipulated by miners.
remainingTerm(DepositUtils.Deposit stora.return: The remaining term of the deposit in seconds. 0 if already at term

signerFeeTbtc(DepositUtils.Deposit stora.details: Signers are paid based on the TBTC issued.

signerPKH(DepositUtils.Deposit storage).details: This is used in bitcoin output scripts for the signers.

signerPubkey(DepositUtils.Deposit storag.details: We store it as 2 bytes32, (2 slots) then repack it on demand.

utxoValue(DepositUtils.Deposit storage).details: We store the deposit as bytes8 to make signature checking easier.

validateAndParseFundingSPVProof(DepositU.details: Takes a pre-parsed transaction and calculates values needed to verify funding.

params._bitcoinHeaders: Single bytestring of 80-byte bitcoin headers, lowest height first.
params._merkleProof: The merkle proof of transaction inclusion in a block.
params._txInputVector: All transaction inputs prepended by the number of inputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) inputs.
params._txOutputVector: All transaction outputs prepended by the number of outputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) outputs.

validateAndParseFundingSPVProof(DepositU.return: The 8-byte LE UTXO size in satoshi, the 36byte outpoint.

wasDigestApprovedForSigning(DepositUtils.details: Identifies entry in the recorded approvals by keep ID and digest pair.
wasDigestApprovedForSigning(DepositUtils.return: Timestamp from the moment of recording the digest for signing.                 Returns 0 if the digest was not approved for signing.

auctionValue(DepositUtils.Deposit storag.notice: Calculates the amount of value at auction right now.

bytes8LEToUint(bytes8).notice: Convert a LE bytes8 to a uint256.

checkProofFromTxId(DepositUtils.Deposit.notice: Syntactically check an SPV proof for a bitcoin transaction with its hash (ID).

depositOwner(DepositUtils.Deposit storag.notice: Looks up the deposit beneficiary by calling the tBTC system.

determineCompressionPrefix(bytes32).notice: Determines the prefix to the compressed public key.

evaluateProofDifficulty(DepositUtils.Dep.notice: Evaluates the header difficulties in a proof.

feeRebateTokenHolder(DepositUtils.Deposi.notice: Looks up the Fee Rebate Token holder.

fetchBitcoinPrice(DepositUtils.Deposit s.notice: Gets the current price of Bitcoin in Ether.

fetchBondAmount(DepositUtils.Deposit sto.notice: Fetches the Keep's bond amount in wei.

findAndParseFundingOutput(DepositUtils.D.notice: Find and validate funding output in transaction output vector using the index.

lotSizeTbtc(DepositUtils.Deposit storage.notice: Gets the lot size in erc20 decimal places (max 18)

redemptionTeardown(DepositUtils.Deposit.notice: Deletes state after termination of redemption process.

remainingTerm(DepositUtils.Deposit stora.notice: Retreive the remaining term of the deposit

signerFeeTbtc(DepositUtils.Deposit stora.notice: Determines the fees due to the signers for work performed.

signerPKH(DepositUtils.Deposit storage).notice: Returns the Bitcoin pubkeyhash (hash160) for the signing group.

signerPubkey(DepositUtils.Deposit storag.notice: Returns the packed public key (64 bytes) for the signing group.

utxoValue(DepositUtils.Deposit storage).notice: Returns the size of the deposit UTXO in satoshi.

validateAndParseFundingSPVProof(DepositU.notice: Validates the funding tx and parses information from it.

wasDigestApprovedForSigning(DepositUtils.notice: Gets timestamp of digest approval for signing.
